entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
